# Installation of `git-crypt` {#sec-install-git-crypt}

The following instructions install `git-crypt` version 0.7.0. Check for new versions at <https://www.agwa.name/projects/git-crypt/>.

```bash
cd /tmp
```

```bash
sudo apt-get -y install g++ make libssl-dev xsltproc
```

```bash
wget https://www.agwa.name/projects/git-crypt/downloads/git-crypt-0.7.0.tar.gz
```

```bash
tar zxvf git-crypt-0.7.0.tar.gz
```

```bash
cd git-crypt-0.7.0 
```

```bash
CXXFLAGS='-DOPENSSL_API_COMPAT=0x30000000L' make
```

```bash
sudo make install
````

## Set Up for New Git Repositories

::: {.callout-important}

Only follow the next steps if you are setting up a new repository.
:::

```bash
echo "_secret* filter=git-crypt diff=git-crypt" > .gitattributes
```

```bash
git-crypt init
```

```bash
git-crypt export-key git_crypt_secret_key
```

Now, copy the `git_crypt_secret_key` file into ownCloud next to keepass files.

```bash
git status
```
